resources.string: Pressing back again will stop the Timer and exit
Please allow permission and launch the app again

Welcome

Here are some tips for using our App :-

-> It is recommended to whitelist the App from Battery Optimization, also allow it to run in background.

-> If any Profile is activated do not force stop and it is recommended not to remove from recents since some OS can kill the App instantly.

-> It may happen that 30 min and never profile is not available or behave ambiguously in your device due to some restrictions.

Thanks for using our App ‚ù§


Developers -
													Ishaan Kaushal & Himank Bose
